datasets.name: DPIRD
datasets.variables: Time series data - Evaporation, rainfall, solar radiation, air temperature, and others
datasets.method: Ad hoc handling of technical issues and missing values

datasets.name: SILO (BOM)
datasets.variables: Continuous daily time series Evaporation, rainfall, solar radiation, air temperature, and others
datasets.method: Observational records or interpolated estimates for missing records

datasets.name: SILO Gridded Data
datasets.variables: Evaporation, rainfall, solar radiation, air temperature, and others
datasets.method: Gridded daily climate surfaces derived either by splining or kriging the observational data

datasets.name: ANUClimate 2.0
datasets.variables: Evaporation, rainfall, solar radiation, air temperature, and others
datasets.method: Derived from observational records, ANUSPLIN Version 4.6 spatial models
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project
datasets.temporal_coverage: At least daily, from 1970 to present

datasets.name: AGCD v1.0.1
datasets.method: Consistent temporal and spatial analyses across Australia
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project

datasets.name: AGCD v2.0.2
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project

datasets.name: BOM Water Outlook
datasets.variables: Precipitation, soil moisture, runoff, deep drainage and evapotranspiration
datasets.method: AWO is produced using a range of climate inputs, static grids and satellite observations as input into the Australian Water Resources Assessment Landscape model (AWRA-L)
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project
datasets.temporal_coverage: daily gridded from 1911 until yesterday (historical), and water balance information, seasonal forecasts, and hydrological projections to 2100

datasets.name: Near surface air temperature
datasets.variables: Hourly air temperature and air temperature climatologies
datasets.method: Near-surface (1.5 m) air temperature grids for Australia. These data are spatially interpolated using quart-variate thin plate splines (full spline dependence on easting, northing, elevation, and time-varying coastal distance index).
datasets.temporal_coverage: hourly air temperature data from January 2015 and climatologies 1990-2019 (every 5th DOY)

datasets.name: BARRA v2
datasets.variables: Temperature, moisture, wind and flux variables at sub-surface, surface, and pressure levels, and heights above surface
datasets.method: BOM's higher resolution regional atmospheric reanalysis over Australia
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project
datasets.temporal_coverage: sub-daily, daily and monthly, from 1979-present day

datasets.name: CMIP6 QLD
datasets.variables: Evaporation, rainfall, solar radiation, air temperature, and others
datasets.method: Gridded climate surfaces derived from regional projection models (QLD-DEC)
datasets.access_conditions: NCI account and membership of the research project
datasets.temporal_coverage: hourly to monthly from several GCMs, historical (1970-2014) and SSP (2.6, 4.5, 7.0)

datasets.name: Chelseaclim
datasets.method: Combines mechanistic and statistical downscaling of GCMs
datasets.access_conditions: CC BY 4.0, with credit to sources

datasets.name: NASA POWER
datasets.variables: Solar and meteorological data sets for support of renewable energy, building energy efficiency and agricultural needs
datasets.method: Derived from NASA research for renewable energy, building energy efficiency, and agricultural needs

datasets.name: WorldClim
datasets.variables: Temperature, precipitation, solar radiation, wind speed, water vapour pressure, bioclimatic variables
datasets.access_conditions: Free for ecological modelling and GIS
